name: Cloudraker
abilities: Can choose to end a transition burn in low orbit of an asset, but takes damage equal to the mass factor of the orbital.

name: Soilrazer
abilities: When bombarding an asset, you may choose a megastructure on the asset to receive one damage. This damage cannot be reduced in any way.

name: Olyphant Support Ship
abilities: Spacecraft in the same orbital as this card may take one less damage when receiving damage from any source.

name: Itano's Cloud
abilities: When this spacecraft makes an attack, choose a spacecraft in orbit around the asset. That spacecraft must spend 2 delta-vee or receive 1 damage.

name: Cheetah Fleet Carrier
abilities: When this spacecraft moves, one other spacecraft in the same orbit may move with it.

name: Javelin Short-Range Defender
abilities: When you construct this spacecraft it may immediately make an attack against a spacecraft in any orbital on the asset. Then it returns to construction with zero construction counters on it.

name: Mobile Construction Yard
abilities: You may activate this spacecraft to add 1 construction to an asset or spacecraft under construction. You may do this only once per turn.

name: Pathmaker
abilities: When this spacecraft destroys another spacecraft, it may regain 1 delta-vee.

name: Herald of Destruction
abilities: When this spacecraft orbits an asset for the first time all enemy spacecraft must spend one delta-vee or take one damage.

name: Steel Bathtub
abilities: This spacecraft does not take damage from debris.

name: Scout Vessel
abilities: Activate: Look at one hidden card attached to the orbitted asset.

name: Nanoswarm Reaper
abilities: When Nanoswarm Reaper damages an asset, that asset cannot be activated for the rest of the round.

name: Nanoswarm Regenerator
abilities: Activate: Nanoswarm Keeper takes one damage, a spacecraft in the same orbital gains one armor. This armor disappears at the end of the round.

name: Nanoswarm Sower
abilities: Spacecraft damaged by Nanoswarm Sower cannot use the repair action for the rest of this round.
